label_to_text_sourish.ANSWERING_PHONE: Answering Phone activity takes place when the actor extracts a smartphone from the pocket and answers to an incoming call
label_to_text_sourish.CLEARING_TABLE: Clearing Table activity takes place when the actor collects dishes, glasses and cutlery, put the bottles in the fridge, and remove the tablecloth from the table
label_to_text_sourish.COOKING: Cooking activity simulates the cooking of milk or pasta. For milk, the actor takes a pot, fills it with some milk taken from the fridge, and warm it by using the cooker. For pasta, the actor takes a pot, fills it with some tap water, and warm it by using the cooker. Then he/she adds salt and pasta to the pot. After a while, he/she drains pasta and, if he/she wants to, dresses it with condiments taken from the fridge
label_to_text_sourish.EATING: Eating activity takes place when the actor sits on a dining room chair and starts eating and drinking. The Eating label is used also when a subject just drink a glass of water
label_to_text_sourish.ENTERING_HOME: Entering Home activity takes place when the actor enters in the smart-home and, if necessary, takes off his/her coat, hanging it on the coat hanger
label_to_text_sourish.LEAVING_HOME: Leaving Home activity takes place when the actor wears the coat, if necessary, and leaves the smart-home
label_to_text_sourish.MAKING_PHONE_CALL: Making Phone Call activity takes place when the actor extracts the smartphone from the pocket, types a phone number, and makes a call
label_to_text_sourish.PREPARING_COLD_MEAL: Preparing Cold Meal activity takes place when the actor prepares a sandwich or a salad. For the sandwich, he/she takes the bread, cuts it with a knife, and fills it with food taken from the fridge. For the salad, he/she takes the salad from the fridge, puts it in a bowl, and mixes it with salt and oil
label_to_text_sourish.SETTING_UP_TABLE: Setting Up Table activity takes place when the actor puts tablecloth, dishes, glasses, napkins, cutlery, and beverages on the table
label_to_text_sourish.TAKING_MEDICINES: Taking Medicines activity takes place when the actor takes a medicine from the proper drawer and gets it; he/she can sit on one of the smart-home chairs, and, if necessary, drinking a glass of water taken from the kitchen
label_to_text_sourish.USING_PC: Using Pc activity takes place when the actor sits on the office chair and uses the pc
label_to_text_sourish.WASHING_DISHES: Washing Dishes activity takes place when the actor washes the dishes in the sink
label_to_text_sourish.WATCHING_TV: Watching Tv activity takes place when the actor switches on the television if is off and sits on a living room chair; at the end of the activity, he/she can switch off the television if nobody else is watching it
label_to_text_sourish.TRANSITION: Transition activity represents the transition between one activity to the subsequent one performed by the subject
